column5: Hate to be a pain in the butt however with spring coming I sure have began to notice a lot of 1st posts in the classifieds which I thought was against the board rules. I know that there may be some great deals but I'm afraid if this isn't nipped in the bud pretty soon we'll have ads from all sorts of commercial guys and Nigerian hopefuls.
Is there one for Russian girls looking for friends  How are ya Gary ?
Maybe that one could be left for a little while...I asked for a PM from her!
TJ is in charge of the commercial guys. I have the African contingent covered.
Your friggn kill,n me Roy. Ya always know when to make someone smile.LOL
